T02n1426u_001:16: analpakalpāsaṃkhyenāpi mārgāntareṇādhigamyaṃ vajrayānopāyayuktānām ihaiva janmani anāyāsasādhyasthira-sarvabhāva [svabhāvam],
T02n1426u_001:24: ca mahāvajrayānaṃ samastayānottamamāgamaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na pratipadyante,
T02n1426u_001:26: tatra prajñopāyaparigṛhītā rūpādayo viṣayāḥ paribhogabhāvamāpadyamānāḥ viśiṣṭaphalāvāhakā bhavantītyavaśyameva prekṣāvadbhirabhyupagantavyam
T02n1426u_001:27: viśiṣṭā hi sāmagrī viśiṣṭameva phalaṃ janayatīti sarvavādiprasiddham |
T02n1426u_001:29: punaḥ kṣīrāvasekādimadhikaṃ kāraṇamāsādya tadeva madhuratayā pratīyate |
T02n1426u_001:30: tadevaṃ - yathā kāraṇāntarābhisaṃskṛtaṃ kāraṇaṃ viśiṣṭaphalāvāhakatvena pratyakṣeṇaiva dṛśyate,
T02n1426u_001:31: evamete rūpādayo viṣayā mahāmudrāniṣpattau mantramudrādhiṣṭhitānāṃ yogināṃ viśiṣṭataraṃ phalamutpādayantīti sadbhiravadheyam |
T02n1426u_001:32: yato na vai kiñcidekaṃ janakamapitu sāmagrī janikā,
T02n1426u_001:33: tena viśiṣṭāt kāraṇā[ntarā]d hi viśiṣṭameva kāryamutpadyate,
T02n1426u_001:35: [prayogaḥ]- tatra ya ime viśiṣṭakāraṇābhi saṃskṛtāste viśiṣṭameva kāryamārabhante,
T02n1426u_001:42: tad tad asati pratibandhake akāraṇavaikalye viśiṣṭakāraṇāntarābhi saṃskārād viśiṣṭameva kārya bhavati iti,
T02n1426u_001:44: tasya tasmāt siddhe vyāpyavyāpakabhāve vyāpake sādhye vyāpyaṃ hetuḥ |
T02n1426u_001:45: tadyathā-vyāpake vṛkṣādike sādhye vyāpyaṃ śiśapādiḥ hetuḥ |
T02n1426u_001:46: siddhatvād vyāpyavyāpaka-bhāvasya na kalpe datra kāraṇaṃ vyāpya-vyāpaka-bhāvāt param |
T02n1426u_001:55: bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ yasya niḥsaṅgā ca matirbhavet |
T02n1426u_001:56: vicikitsā naiva karttavyā tasyedaṃ sidhyate dhruvam ||5 ||
T02n1426u_001:63: na caitacchakyate vaktuṃ yathaite rūpādayo viṣayāḥ kleśaprasūti-hetutvādapāyahetava iti |
T02n1426u_001:70: yadi punaḥ viṣayāḥ sarvadā rāgahetava eva tadā kathaṃ samviparītajñānamapi janayanti aśucyādibhirākāraiḥ,
T02n1426u_001:73: evaṃ viṣayāḥ viśiṣṭasamāropād viśiṣṭapariṇāmācca viśiṣṭaphalaniṣpattau hetubhāvaṃ pratipadyanta iti kiṃ na iṣyate?yathā -
T02n1426u_001:75: aśuciḥ kāminī bhakṣyā iti tisro vikalpanāḥ ||9 ||
T02n1426u_001:76: na ca ete'pi viśiṣṭasamāropāḥ tathāpariṇāmācca saṃsārabandhahetukā bhavanti iti,
T02n1426u_001:78: yasmād trimaṇḍalapariśuddheḥ mantra-mudrāpariṇāmaḥ tasmānmantrādibhirāhitaviśeṣā rūpādayo viṣayā anuttarameva phalaṃ kurvanti |
T02n1426u_001:79: yathā viṣādikaṃ mantrādibhiḥ saṃskṛtyopabhujyamānamanyadeva rasāyanādikaṃ phalamāvahata iti,
T02n1426u_001:81: evaṃ viṣayā api mantra mudrādhiṣṭhitā viśiṣṭatarameva phalaṃ vikurvantīti sutarāmavavoddhavyam |
T02n1426u_001:83: rāgo dveṣaśca mohaśca trayaite viṣamaṃ gatāḥ |
T02n1426u_001:89: evameva yo bodhisattvasya kleśa saṃkarakūṭaḥ saḥ sarvajñatāyām upakārībhūto bhavati |
T02n1426u_001:90: tadyathā kāśyapa mantrauṣadhiparigṛhītaṃ viṣaṃ na nighātayati evameva prajñopāyasamanvitobodhisattvaḥ |
T02n1426u_001:97: punaścoktam upāliparipṛcchāsūtre - rāgo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvārthatāyāṃ saṃvartate,
T02n1426u_001:99: sāmagrībhedāt kāryabheda- darśanād dharmanairātmyāvabodhācca na tatrābhiniveśaḥ kayañcidapi,
T02n1426u_001:102: tattaireva sukhairāhāravihārādibhistatphalamabhimukhīkriyate yasya puraḥ saraṃ vibhavaḥ sa sādṛśaḥ syāt |
T02n1426u_001:112: nātiśaucaṃ na niyamo na tapo na ca duṣkaraiḥ |
T02n1426u_001:114: yathā,bhagavatā rūpādayaḥ tannirjātāḥ sukhapariṇāmanāḥ anuttaraphalaheturuktāḥ tathā sparśanirjātasukhapariṇāmanā api |
T02n1426u_001:117: tatra virodhaḥ tasya pratiṣiddhatvāditi cet, na,
T02n1426u_001:120: ye hi prajñopāyarahitā ātmātmīyagrahābhiniveśena pariṇāmanānabhijñāḥ sparśaviśeṣaṃ saṃsevante,
T02n1426u_001:123: bhikṣubhāve sthitā ye ca ye ca tarkaratā narāḥ |
T02n1426u_001:124: vṛddhabhāve sthitā ye ca teṣāṃ tattvaṃ na deśayet ||16 ||
T02n1426u_001:125: bhagavatā tān prati sandhārya pratiṣedha uktaḥ |
T02n1426u_001:131: śrāvakānāṃ mahāvīreṇā va tārāya teṣu vai ||18 ||
T02n1426u_001:132: na tu prajñopāyaparigṛhītamūrtīnāṃ viśiṣṭaphalānveṣiṇāṃ viśiṣṭa pariṇāmanāphalamanubhavatāṃ paramārthadharmatattvāvabodhāt manāmapi teṣāṃ taddoṣabhāgitā
T02n1426u_001:133: kintu mativiśeṣeṇa samanvitāḥ santoṣasya cānuttarasya lābhino bhavanti,
T02n1426u_001:138: saṅkalpād bodhisattvānāṃ śubhaṃ vā yadi vā'śubham |
T02n1426u_001:139: sarva kalyāṇatāmeti teṣāṃ vaśyaṃ yato manaḥ ||19 ||
T02n1426u_001:140: tena saṅkalpakṛteṣu puṇyāpuṇyeṣu yasya viśiṣṭa eva kāraṇāntara kṛtasaṅkalpaviśeṣaḥ,
T02n1426u_001:141: rūpādiṣu sa tasmādāśayaviśeṣād viśiṣṭameva phalaṃ tasya avaśyamakāmakairapi parairapyupagantavyam iti |
T02n1426u_001:150: dṛśyate spṛśyate caiva yathā māyā hi sarvataḥ |
T02n1426u_001:151: na copalabhyate caivaṃ sarvasya jagataḥ sthitiḥ |
T02n1426u_001:154: yaireva mūḍhā vadhyante buddhāḥ krīḍanti tairiha |
T02n1426u_001:181: sarva śūnyapade yojyaṃ tapo hyeṣa mahātmanām ||32 ||
T02n1426u_001:188: teṣāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni vilāsārthaṃ ca sṛṣṭavān ||35 ||
T02n1426u_001:191: darpaṇaprativimbaṃ ca svapnaṃ māyāṃ ca budbudam |
T02n1426u_001:192: indrajālaṃ ca sadṛśaṃ yaḥ paśyet sa prabhuḥ smṛtaḥ ||37 ||
T02n1426u_001:196: tena na kasyacit sthitirasti yatrābhiniveśaḥ syāt |
T02n1426u_001:197: 'yadā caivaṃbhūtairapi māyopamaiḥ bhāvairviśiṣṭasaṃbhogasañjātasukhasparśa -pariṇāmata na yā kiñcid viśiṣṭaphalaṃ prāpyate,
T02n1426u_001:201: yadi ete viśiṣṭabhāvanābhyāsabalād viśiṣṭasukhasaumanasyādikakāryeṣu āryānuttaraphalāvāptihetubhāvaṃ pratipadyante,
T02n1426u_001:219: bhikṣāśinā na japtavyaṃ na ca bhaikṣyaratirbhavet |
T02n1426u_001:223: tena prakṛtiprabhāsvara-sphaṭikopalasadṛśe manasi rūpādibhirā hitasaṃskāraviśeṣa-sukhasaumanasyalakṣaṇaḥ saḥ tatra prajñopāyaparigṛhītasyābhyāsaviśeṣabalāt prakarṣaparyantarūpatāmāsādayediti |
T02n1426u_001:225: śabdādi viṣayānubhavasañjātasaṃskāraviśeṣa to yogijñānam asakṛdbhāvanābhyāsasāmarthyāt samāhita paramaśāśvatasvabhāvaṃ bhāvanāprakarṣaparyanta māyāt |
T02n1426u_001:234: tena tadatra sāmagrī bhāvanatayā vyavasthitaṃ tadviruddhasya duḥkhāde ra vakāśamapākaroti |
T02n1426u_001:237: evam anayorapi sukhaduḥkhayorna caikatra santānātmani kathamapi sambhavaḥ,
T02n1426u_001:239: tena sukhasaumanasyādi sātmīkaraṇe naiva duḥkhādīnāṃ kathamapi sambhāva nī yatāmāropayati iti yuktamuktam - svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhiḥ tadrūpābhāvaṃ pratipādayati |
T02n1426u_001:243: kiñca bhāvyamānānāmapi yadi viśeṣāṇāṃ tāvadapi nivṛttiriṣyate,
T02n1426u_001:244: tadā pṛthvīkṛtsnādikamapi bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantavartināṃ tathaiva nivṛttimāpādayed iti |
T02n1426u_001:245: na ceṣyate,yasmād ye prakarṣaparyantavartitayā svātmalābhabhāvāḥ na teṣāmāvartanam,
T02n1426u_001:250: ye tu doṣādayo vyāvṛttibhāginaḥ teṣāṃ ca tadānīṃ nāyaṃ bhāvaḥ |
T02n1426u_001:253: anyathā mokṣānantaramapi saṃsāraḥ syād iti na ceṣyate prayujyateḥ vā |
T02n1426u_001:254: ye mokṣaṃ prāptasya saṃsārotpatti neṣyante eva te'
T02n1426u_001:260: tathā sukhaprakarṣaparyantagamanānantaraṃ duḥkhaṃ cittasyāpi na jāyate,
T02n1426u_001:262: tataḥ yena yena vāsyate tatra tatra cābhyāsabalād viśiṣṭatarasvabhāvamāviṣkaroti aparāvṛttidharmatālakṣaṇam |
T02n1426u_001:264: yena yena hi bhāvena manaḥ saṃyujyate nṛṇām |
T02n1426u_001:266: tena sarvametad viśiṣṭapariṇāmanayā pariṇāmyamāne viśiṣṭaphalāvāhakaṃ bhavati iti |
T02n1426u_001:273: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyānulepanāni dadāti tathāgateṣu tathāgatacaityeṣu vā |
T02n1426u_001:276: tatra buddhakṣetreṣu sarvasattvānāṃ divyāḥ sparśaviśeṣāḥ abhiniṣpadyantām |
T02n1426u_001:279: manoratha - saṅkalpenaiva iṣṭān pañcakāmaguṇān buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakasaṅghānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ copanāmayeyam |
T02n1426u_001:280: tasyaivaṃ sañjānata evaṃ bhavati -anena kuśalamūlena mama buddhakṣetre anuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambuddhasya śrāvakasaṅghasya satvānāṃ ca manoratha - saṅkalpenaiva iṣṭāḥ kāmaguṇāḥ prādurbhavantu |
T02n1426u_001:282: bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvasattvaiḥ sārddha samyaksambuddhebhyo vā pañcakāmaguṇadānaṃ dadāti evamādi |
T02n1426u_001:284: mātuluṅgādi phalaṃ loke yathā lākṣādisekād uktarūpam,
T02n1426u_001:285: tathā cāsya citasya bāhya-sparśādisevanāt tadeva sukhādikaṃ saṃskāraviśeṣaprativedhāhitaviśeṣatvāt punaḥ tatraiva abhimukhībhavati |
T02n1426u_001:287: tadapi yathā dhattūrakarpāsa vīja dāḍimādīnāṃ kāraṇāntarairāhitaviśeṣaṃ tatra tathaiva phalaṃ pratīyate,
T02n1426u_001:299: na tatra tattvaṃ vidyate nendriyārthā na dhātavaḥ |
T02n1426u_001:300: na manaścaittakaṃ nāpi nāhaṅkāro na dhīrapi ||50 ||
T02n1426u_001:301: na ca sattvaṃ na ca prajñā na cittaṃ naiva kiñcit |
T02n1426u_001:303: na saṃjñā na ca ceṣṭā tu na rūpaṃ na guṇaḥ kvacit |
T02n1426u_001:304: nirvāṇaṃ tatsamuddiṣṭaṃ mokṣaṃ tu niṣkalaṃ bhavet || 52 ||
T02n1426u_001:306: tadā prabuddho vijñeyo nirvāṇaṃ yadi necchati ||53 ||
T02n1426u_001:308: nirvāṇaṃ yaḥ prapadyeta vinā siddhiṃ na vīryavān ||54 ||
T02n1426u_001:310: yaḥ parāṃ bodhimāsādhya vinā siddheḥ prahīyate ||55 ||
T02n1426u_001:311: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ caureṇātmāpahāriṇā |
T02n1426u_001:313: na tasya vidyate vīryaṃ na ca sattvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam |
T02n1426u_001:315: nānyo hīnatarastasmāt nānyaḥ syād durjano janaḥ |
T02n1426u_001:320: nāsti tattvavrataṃ puṃsāṃ mahāphala pradaṃ yataḥ |
T02n1426u_001:325: na kṛtaghnatastvanye ye prabodhiṃ gatā narāḥ |
T02n1426u_001:333: dahyate dṛśyate naiva gacchanno dhūma eva vā ||65 ||
T02n1426u_001:336: prayogaśca- ye ye prāptaprakarṣaparyantāḥ na te vyāvartante |
T02n1426u_001:340: itaraśca - ye hi bhāvyante te bhāvanābhyāsasāmarthyāt samāhitaparamaprakarṣaparyantavartino bhavanti,
T02n1426u_001:347: na punastadanyena kenacid api vyāvartate tatsvabhāvatāmupagataḥ |
T02n1426u_001:348: tadyathā- kāṣṭhādau agnidāhitā viśeṣā na tadvyāvartante,
T02n1426u_001:351: na puna rdāhataḥ kiñcid vikārajananaṃ kvacit |
T02n1426u_001:353: hemādau agnikṛta viśeṣaḥ tatsantānavyāvṛttau tadviparītakāraṇataḥ tatsvabhāvabhāvaṃ sampāditaḥ yathā agnijalādiḥ |
T02n1426u_001:354: akhilahuta suvarṇasya asyāpi anya eva kaṭhinasvabhāvādhyāsitaviśeṣaḥ sañjāyate svabhāvādhivāsitaviśeṣāntara utpadyate |
T02n1426u_001:356: taduttarottaraṃ tasyaiva kāraṇasya saṃsevanena parāṃ niṣṭhām āsādyamānasya na vyāvṛttiḥ,
T02n1426u_001:358: yena buddhirhi tadanuraktā satī samāsāditaguṇā ca tadeva kāraṇam ādatte,
T02n1426u_001:359: tadviparīte ca vimukhyān na kathañcid vyāvartate |
T02n1426u_001:364: tadyathā - kasyacit śrotriyasya mahāvratadhāriṇo nairghṛṇyaṃ bhāvanāsātmīkaraṇāt tatsāmyamāsādayati tacca svasaṃvedyaṃ sukhasaumanasyādi sarvasantānavarti svasaṃvedanapratyakṣaṃ siddhaṃ,
T02n1426u_001:366: pravāhaviccheda kāraṇābhāvāt duḥkhādi pravāha vicchitikāraṇāni naṃ saṃvidyante |
T02n1426u_001:370: prekṣāvān kvacid anyathā prekṣāvān na syāt,
T02n1426u_001:373: kintu kiñcinmātra sevanenāpi buddhi staddhitānubandhitvāt tadviparītakāraṇārthamiha kathamapi na sañjāyate |
T02n1426u_001:374: na hi kaścijjānanneva ahiviṣa kaṇṭakādīn upādatte |
T02n1426u_001:376: tāni ca heyarūpatayā buddhyā prāgeva nirastāni,
T02n1426u_001:380: bhāvanāviśeṣeṇāpi viśiṣṭatā labhyate prajñādīnāṃ tenābhyāsastāvad vidyate |
T02n1426u_001:382: yena sukhasaumanasyādyabhyasyamānaṃ na tadvipakṣe duḥkhādauṃ pravartate |
T02n1426u_001:386: yena ime prajñāśilpakalādayaḥ pratipuruṣābhyāsatayā bheda viśeṣam āsādyamānāḥ saṃlakṣyate |
T02n1426u_001:396: hattvā rāgaṃ virāgaṃ ca sarvasaukhyaṃ vadanti te ||68 ||
T02n1426u_001:400: kiñca evamuktaṃ bhagavatā śīlapaṭale - bodhisattvena daśakuśalānyapi parārthena khaṇḍayitavyāni |
T02n1426u_001:401: yathā-kācit kāmārthinī strī bodhisattvaṃ prati prāṇān tyajet,
T02n1426u_001:406: tad yadi ete rāgādayaḥ prakṛtisāvadyāstadā kathaṃ durgatihetavo na bhavanti ?
T02n1426u_001:410: yathā ketakīpuṣpaṃ gandhahastinopabhuktaṃ kastūrikādi bhāvena pariṇamate,
T02n1426u_001:421: hetu prayogaḥ - ye ye viśiṣṭasantānabhāginaḥ te te viśiṣṭaphalāvāhakāḥ,
T02n1426u_001:430: tadatrāpi viśiṣṭapariṇāmān nānyadapekṣata iti tanmātrānubandha uktaḥ |
T02n1426u_001:437: tatsāmībhāvamupagataṃ bhāvasaṃviśiṣṭameva rūpāntaraṃ janayati tathā tāmrādiṣu sthirīkṛtapāradādi rasāvedhasāmarthyādanyadevāvasthāntaraṃ janayate
T02n1426u_001:444: ramajātamatīva vedhanīyaṃ sudṛḍhaṃ gṛhṇata bodhicitta saṃjñam ||69 ||
T02n1426u_001:446: puṇyena sukhitaḥ kāyaḥ pāṇḍityena manaḥ sukhi |
T02n1426u_001:447: tiṣṭhan parārtha saṃsāre dayāluḥ kena khidyate ||70 ||
T02n1426u_001:448: kiñca,yayā rasāyanikaḥ dhanikaḥ puruṣaḥ kaścid viśiṣṭauṣadhisaṃyogāt samāsāditatadguṇamāhātmyaḥ,
T02n1426u_001:450: tathā'nye ca guṇāḥ āsaṃsāraṃ sthiti kurvanti,
T02n1426u_001:451: evameva viśiṣṭaviṣayaparibhogasañjāta rasāyanasya āsaṃsāra-prakṛta-praṇidhividhānasya parārthaparasya samāhitasakala guṇagaṇasya pratividdhabodhicittarasasya kimiti sattvaṃ neṣyate?kiṃ ca -
T02n1426u_001:452: na bodhi niḥkleśāṃ kṛtagati ravāpnoti paramāṃ
T02n1426u_001:455: na nirdagdhāḥ kleśāḥ tṛṇalavaladhutvaṃ tu gamitāḥ ||71 ||
T02n1426u_001:458: anenaivaṃ tvaddhīstadanu na kṛtā bhrāntaviṣayā guṇānāṃ kṣetratvaṃ jagati janidhārā api kṛtāḥ ||72 ||
T02n1426u_001:463: na hi savikalpakād vijñānāt nirvikalpakasya jñānasya prasūtiḥ kathamapi sambhavati |
T02n1426u_001:466: yataḥ kleśopakleśavāsanānivṛttau kimaparamasti yad vikalpakaṃ syāt,
T02n1426u_001:475: grāhya- grāhakākāradvayavinirmuktajñānaṃ vinā bhāvi kāryākhyaṃ svabhāvākhyaṃ vā liṅgaṃ na upalabhyate |
T02n1426u_001:489: neyārthā sā tvayā nātha !bhāṣitā samvṛtistu sā ||74 ||
T02n1426u_001:495: na cāparo heturiṣyate pramāṇāntaraśceti kuto nirvikalpakasya jñānasya niścayo vācyaḥ?tathoktam -
T02n1426u_001:500: na hi gaganāmbhoruhādīnāṃ savikalpakatvaṃ nirvikalpakatvaṃ vā iṣyate,
T02n1426u_001:505: na ca sādhyamakurvāṇaṃ sādhanaṃ tatra kīrtyate |
T02n1426u_001:506: tasmāt sarvameva jñānaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ grāhyagrāhakākārarūpatayā vartamānaṃ savikalpakamiti pratijānīmahe,
T02n1426u_001:509: āryo na paśyati bhrāntiṃ nāpi tattvaṃ tadantare |
T02n1426u_001:511: bhrānti vidhūya sarvāṃ hi nimittaṃ jāyate yadi |
T02n1426u_001:512: saiva tasya bhaved bhrāntiraśuddhaṃ timiraṃ yathā ||77 ||
T02n1426u_001:517: tatsamānajātīyapravāha pravṛttaṃ grāhyagrāhakākārasaṃvidbhedena yuktaṃ adhyavasita svarūpamavicchinna santānaṃ dharmakaṃ svacitta-vaśitāprāptaṃ savikalpakamapi yathāvasthitasakalapadārthaparicchedakam,
T02n1426u_001:520: na me yānaṃ mahāyānaṃ na ghoṣo na ca akṣarāḥ |
T02n1426u_001:521: na ca dhyānaṃ vimokṣo vai na nirābhāsagocaram ||78 ||
T02n1426u_001:526: arthānvayavyatirekānukāri savikalpakam api jñānaṃ aspaṣṭābham uktam ācārya - dharmakīrtipādairapi laukikapramāṇa parīkṣāyām |
T02n1426u_001:537: atha grāhya-grāhaka-saṃvityākāratayā ābhāsa mānasya jñānasya prakarṣaparyantagamane sarvavityarthamiṣyate,
T02n1426u_001:541: na hi nirābhāsasya jñānasya kathamapi paricchedakatvaṃ vidyate,
T02n1426u_001:545: atha svabhāva eva tasyāyaṃ yat tatprakarṣaparyantagamane sarvasaṃvittau sa svabhāvo'
T02n1426u_001:547: tathā hi grāhyagrāhakasaṃvittibhedenabhidyamānasyāpi prakarṣaparyantagamane tadeva viśiṣṭarūpaṃ jāyate |
T02n1426u_001:549: tasya tatsāmarthya kiṃ kākena bhakṣitam kiñca,
T02n1426u_001:554: evāti bhāvyate tattadeva bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantagamane tatsātmatāmāpādayati-tadyathā śrotriyajātibhāvādau ghṛṇām |
T02n1426u_001:555: bhāvyate ca sarvameva trailokyaṃ tadupabhogatayā iti svabhāvahetuḥ |
T02n1426u_001:566: bhāvyante sarvadā tattrailokyāntaravarttinaḥ padārthāḥ sukhasaumanasyādisādhanatvena sthitāḥ |
T02n1426u_001:576: tena savikalpakamapi jñānaṃ bhāvanāsāmarthyanirjātaṃ svabhāvaviśeṣabhājinam aśeṣaguṇālayam -
T02n1426u_001:581: jñāte tasmin bhavet sarvaṃ vijñātaṃ tattvasaṃjñitam ||89 ||
